channel.title: ASHRAE 205 Fan Representation Specification – Specifications
channel.description: Recent content in Specifications on ASHRAE 205 Fan Representation Specification

item.title: Specifications: ASHRAE205
item.description:
ASHRAE205

Enumerations

SchemaType

Enumerator Description Notes
RS0001 Liquid-Cooled Chiller
RS0002 Unitary Cooling Air-Conditioning Equipment
RS0003 Fan Assembly
RS0004 Air-to-Air Direct Expansion Refrigerant Coil System
RS0005 Motor
RS0006 Electronic Motor Drive
RS0007 Mechanical Drive

CompressorType

Enumerator Description Notes
RECIPROCATING Reciprocating compressor
SCREW Screw compressor
CENTRIFUGAL Centrifugal compressor
ROTARY Rotary compressor
SCROLL Scroll compressor

CompressorSpeedControlType

Enumerator Description Notes
DISCRETE Compressor loading is controlled by cycling between one or more discrete stages
CONTINUOUS Compressor loading is controlled by continuously varying the speed of the compressor

CondenserType

Enumerator Description Notes
AIR Air-cooled condenser
LIQUID Liquid-cooled condenser
EVAPORATIVE Evaporative condenser

LiquidConstituent

Enumerator Description Notes
WATER Water
PROPYLENE_GLYCOL Propylene glycol
ETHYLENE_GLYCOL Ethylene glycol
SODIUM_CHLORIDE Sodium chloride
CALCIUM_CHLORIDE Calcium chloride
ETHANOL Ethanol
METHANOL Methanol

ConcentrationType

Enumerator Description Notes
BY_VOLUME Concentration is defined as a fraction of total liquid mixture volume
BY_MASS Concentration is defined as a fraction of total liquid mixture mass

Data Groups

LiquidMixture

Name Description Data Type Units Constraints Req Notes
liquid_components An array of all liquid components within the liquid mixture [{LiquidComponent}] \(✓\) Array may contain a single component
concentration_type Defines whether concentration is defined on a volume or mass basis <ConcentrationType> \(✓\)

LiquidComponent

Name Description Data Type Units Constraints Req Notes
liquid_constituent Substance of this component of the mixture <LiquidConstituent> \(✓\)
concentration Concentration of this component of the mixture Numeric ≥0.0, ≤1.0 If omitted, assume equal distribution with any other component with no defined concentration (e.g., can be left blank for the primary component)

item.title: Specifications: RS0003
item.description:
RS0003

Enumerations

OperationSpeedControlType

Enumerator Description Notes
DISCRETE Fan assemblies that operate at one or more defined speeds dictated by a tap or dip switch Performance map data is provided at individual impeller speeds
CONTINUOUS Fan assemblies that operate within a continuous range of speeds Performance map data is provided over a range of impeller speeds

InstallationSpeedControlType

Enumerator Description Notes
FIXED Fan speed does not change after installation Informative note: Examples include dip-switch/tap selection and pulley adjustments
VARIABLE Fan speed can change depending on operation after installation

ImpellerType

Enumerator Description Notes
CENTRIFUGAL_FORWARD_CURVED Forward curved fan impeller
CENTRIFUGAL_BACKWARD_CURVED Backward curved or inclined fan impeller
CENTRIFUGAL_AIR_FOIL Air foil impeller with shaped blades
AXIAL Fan impeller with shaft parallel to air flow stream for high static applications
PROPELLER Fan impeller with shaft parallel to air flow stream for low static pressure applications

ComponentType

Enumerator Description Notes
COIL Finned coil in cross-flow arrangement
FURNACE Fuel-fired heating section
FILTER Air filters
HEAT_EXCHANGER Heat exchanger e.g., air-to-air heat exchanger
ELECTRIC_RESISTANCE_ELEMENT Electric resistance heater elements
DIRECT_EVAPORATIVE Wetted evaporative cooling media
OTHER Additional components in air stream

Data Groups

RS0003

Name Description Data Type Units Constraints Req Notes
metadata Metadata data group {Metadata} data_model=ASHRAE_205, schema=RS0003 \(✓\)
description Data group describing product and rating information {Description}
performance Data group containing performance information {Performance} \(✓\)

Description

Name Description Data Type Units Constraints Req Notes
product_information Data group describing product information {ProductInformation}

ProductInformation

Name Description Data Type Units Constraints Req Notes
manufacturer Assembly/unit manufacturer name String
model_number Assembly/unit model number Pattern Pattern shall match all model numbers that can be represented by the representation
impeller_type Type of impeller in fan assembly <ImpellerType>
number_of_impellers Number of impellers included in the fan assembly Integer

Performance

Name Description Data Type Units Constraints Req Notes
nominal_standard_air_volumetric_flow_rate Nominal or rated air flow rate at standard air conditions Numeric m3/s ≥0.0 \(✓\) Used for calculating component wet pressure difference
is_enclosed Fan assembly is enclosed Boolean \(✓\) True if the performance data reflects the static pressure difference across the enclosure
assembly_components An array of components included in the fan assembly air stream, not including any fans [{AssemblyComponent}] if is_enclosed=True
heat_loss_fraction Fraction of efficiency losses transferred into the air stream Numeric - ≥0.0, ≤1.0 \(✓\) Used to determine amount of heat from the motor added to the air stream
maximum_impeller_rotational_speed Maximum impeller rotational speed Numeric rev/s ≥0.0 \(✓\)
minimum_impeller_rotational_speed Minimum impeller rotational speed Numeric rev/s ≥0.0 \(✓\) If no minimum, use zero
stability_curve The system curve defining the stability area for system selection {SystemCurve} Informative note: Application software may use this curve to indicate to application software users when a selected fan is operating in an unstable region where surging or stalling is likely to occur
operation_speed_control_type Type of performance map {OperationSpeedControlType} \(✓\) Determines which performance map data group is used for performance_map
installation_speed_control_type Type of fan impeller speed control {InstallationSpeedControlType} \(✓\)

  • If operation_speed_control_type is DISCRETE and installation_speed_control_type is FIXED, impeller speed shall be restricted to a single discrete speed

  • If operation_speed_control_type is DISCRETE and installation_speed_control_type is VARIABLE, impeller speed shall be restricted to a set of two or more discrete speeds

  • If operation_speed_control_type is CONTINUOUS and installation_speed_control_type is FIXED, impeller speed shall be restricted to a single speed (which may be interpolated from impeller_speed values provided in the performance map)

  • If operation_speed_control_type is CONTINUOUS and installation_speed_control_type is VARIABLE, impeller speed shall be unrestricted within operational limits
motor_representation The corresponding Standard 205 motor representation {RS0005} If the fan assembly is packaged with a motor, a motor representation shall be provided
mechanical_drive_representation The corresponding Standard 205 mechanical drive representation {RS0007} If the fan assembly is packaged with a mechanical drive, a mechanical drive representation shall be provided
performance_map Data group describing fan assembly performance when operating ({PerformanceMapContinuous}, {PerformanceMapDiscrete}) operation_speed_control_type(CONTINUOUS, DISCRETE) \(✓\)

AssemblyComponent

Name Description Data Type Units Constraints Req Notes
component_type Type of component <ComponentType> \(✓\)
component_description Informative description of the component String
component_id Identifier of the corresponding Standard 205 representation UUID Optionally provided if the component has a Standard 205 representation
wet_pressure_difference Additional static pressure difference if the component is wet (e.g., because of condensate collection or wetting evaporative media) Numeric Pa ≥0.0 \(✓\)

  • Corresponds to additional pressure difference at nominal_standard_air_volumetric_flow_rate

  • If unknown, a value of 75 Pa shall be used

SystemCurve

Name Description Data Type Units Constraints Req Notes
standard_air_volumetric_flow_rate Volumetric air flow rate through an air distribution system at standard air conditions [Numeric][2..] m3/s ≥0.0 \(✓\)
static_pressure_difference Static pressure difference of an air distribution system [Numeric][2..] Pa ≥0.0 \(✓\)

PerformanceMapContinuous

Name Description Data Type Units Constraints Req Notes
grid_variables Data group describing grid variables for continuous fan performance {GridVariablesContinuous} \(✓\)
lookup_variables Data group describing lookup variables for continuous fan performance {LookupVariablesContinuous} \(✓\)

GridVariablesContinuous

Name Description Data Type Units Constraints Req Notes
standard_air_volumetric_flow_rate Volumetric air flow rate through fan assembly at standard air conditions [Numeric][1..] m3/s ≥0.0 \(✓\)
static_pressure_difference External static pressure across fan assembly at dry coil conditions [Numeric][1..] Pa ≥0.0 \(✓\) Any static pressure deduction (or addition) for wet coil is specified by wet_pressure_difference in ‘assembly_components’ data group

LookupVariablesContinuous

Name Description Data Type Units Constraints Req Notes
impeller_rotational_speed Rotational speed of fan impeller [Numeric/Null][1..] rev/s ≥0.0 \(✓\)
shaft_power Mechanical shaft power input to fan assembly [Numeric/Null][1..] W ≥0.0 \(✓\) Does not include the mechanical efficiency of any mechanical drive used to modify rotational speed between the motor and impeller

PerformanceMapDiscrete

Name Description Data Type Units Constraints Req Notes
grid_variables Data group describing grid variables for discrete fan performance {GridVariablesDiscrete} \(✓\)
lookup_variables Data group describing lookup variables for discrete fan performance {LookupVariablesDiscrete} \(✓\)

GridVariablesDiscrete

Name Description Data Type Units Constraints Req Notes
speed_number Number indicating discrete speed of fan impeller in rank order (with 1 being the lowest speed) [Integer][1..] - ≥0 \(✓\) Data shall be provided for all allowable discrete speeds or settings
static_pressure_difference External static pressure across fan assembly at dry coil conditions [Numeric][1..] Pa ≥0.0 \(✓\) Any static pressure deduction (or addition) for wet coil is specified by wet_pressure_difference in ‘assembly_components’ data group

LookupVariablesDiscrete

Name Description Data Type Units Constraints Req Notes
standard_air_volumetric_flow_rate Volumetric air flow rate through fan assembly at standard air conditions [Numeric/Null][1..] m3/s ≥0.0 \(✓\)
shaft_power Mechanical shaft power input to fan assembly [Numeric/Null][1..] W ≥0.0 \(✓\) Does not include the mechanical efficiency of any mechanical drive used to modify rotational speed between the motor and impeller
impeller_rotational_speed Rotational speed of fan impeller [Numeric/Null][1..] rev/s ≥0.0 \(✓\)

item.title: Specifications: RS0005
item.description:
RS0005

Enumerations

None.

Data Groups

RS0005

Name Description Data Type Units Constraints Req Notes
metadata Metadata data group {Metadata} schema=RS0005 \(✓\)
description Data group describing product and rating information {Description}
performance Data group containing performance information {Performance} \(✓\)

Description

Name Description Data Type Units Constraints Req Notes
product_information Data group describing product information {ProductInformation}

ProductInformation

Name Description Data Type Units Constraints Req Notes
manufacturer Manufacturer name String
model_number Model number Pattern Pattern shall match all model numbers that can be represented by the representation
nominal_voltage Nominal voltage Numeric V ≥0.0
nominal_frequency Nominal frequency Numeric Hz ≥0.0

Performance

Name Description Data Type Units Constraints Req Notes
maximum_power Maximum operational input power to the motor Numeric W ≥0.0 \(✓\) Operational limit set to prevent overheating or overcurrent, not the rated name plate power
standby_power Power draw when motor is not operating Numeric W ≥0.0 \(✓\)
number_of_poles Number of poles Integer >0, %2 \(✓\)
drive_representation The corresponding Standard 205 drive representation {RS0006}
performance_map Data group describing motor performance when operating {PerformanceMap}

  • If no performance map is defined, the motor shall be assumed to transfer all electric power directly to mechanical shaft power

  • Informative note: This field may be omitted for motor-driven equipment where motor efficiencies are incorporated into their performance data

PerformanceMapMotor

Name Description Data Type Units Constraints Req Notes
grid_variables Data group describing grid variables for motor performance {GridVariablesMotor} \(✓\)
lookup_variables Data group describing lookup variables for motor performance {LookupVariables} \(✓\)

GridVariablesMotor

Name Description Data Type Units Constraints Req Notes
shaft_power Delivered rotational shaft power [Numeric][1..] W ≥0.0 \(✓\)
shaft_rotational_speed Rotational speed of shaft [Numeric][1..] rev/s ≥0.0 \(✓\)

LookupVariablesMotor

Name Description Data Type Units Constraints Req Notes
efficiency Efficiency of motor [Numeric/Null][1..] - ≥0.0, ≤1.0 \(✓\) Defined as the ratio of mechanical shaft power to electrical input power of the motor
power_factor Power factor of the motor [Numeric/Null][1..] - ≥0.0, ≤1.0 \(✓\)

item.title: Specifications: RS0006
item.description:
RS0006

Enumerations

CoolingMethod

Enumerator Description Notes
PASSIVE_COOLED Drive is cooled using natural air convection within the surrounding environment All drive efficiency losses are assumed to be added as heat to the surrounding environment
ACTIVE_AIR_COOLED Drive is cooled using forced air convection within the surrounding environment

  • Electrical power required for the active cooling system shall be included in the efficiency of the drive

  • All drive efficiency losses are assumed to be added as heat to the surrounding environment
ACTIVE_LIQUID_COOLED Drive is cooled using forced liquid convection, transferring heat to the liquid

  • Any liquid pumping power shall be modeled external to the drive by the application software

  • All drive efficiency losses are assumed to be added as heat to the liquid stream

Data Groups

RS0006

Name Description Data Type Units Constraints Req Notes
metadata Metadata data group {Metadata} schema=RS0006 \(✓\)
description Data group describing product and rating information {Description}
performance Data group containing performance information {Performance} \(✓\)

Description

Name Description Data Type Units Constraints Req Notes
product_information Data group describing product information {ProductInformation}

ProductInformation

Name Description Data Type Units Constraints Req Notes
manufacturer Manufacturer name String
model_number Model number Pattern Pattern shall match all model numbers that can be represented by the representation

Performance

Name Description Data Type Units Constraints Req Notes
maximum_power Maximum power draw of the drive Numeric W ≥0.0 \(✓\)
standby_power Power draw when the motor is not operating Numeric W ≥0.0 \(✓\)
cooling_method Method used to cool the drive <CoolingMethod> \(✓\)
performance_map Data group describing drive performance when operating {PerformanceMap} \(✓\)

PerformanceMapDrive

Name Description Data Type Units Constraints Req Notes
grid_variables Data group describing grid variables for drive performance {GridVariablesDrive} \(✓\)
lookup_variables Data group describing lookup variables for drive performance {LookupVariables} \(✓\)

GridVariablesDrive

Name Description Data Type Units Constraints Req Notes
output_power Power delivered to the motor [Numeric][1..] W ≥0.0 \(✓\)
output_frequency Frequency delivered to the motor [Numeric][1..] Hz ≥0.0 \(✓\)

LookupVariablesDrive

Name Description Data Type Units Constraints Req Notes
efficiency Efficiency of drive [Numeric/Null][1..] - ≥0.0, ≤1.0 \(✓\)

  • Defined as the ratio of electrical output power (to the motor) to electrical input power (to the drive)

  • Input power shall include any power required to provide active air cooling for the drive

item.title: Specifications: RS0007
item.description:
RS0007

Enumerations

DriveType

Enumerator Description Notes
V_BELT V-Belt
COGGED_BELT Cogged Belt
SYNCHRONOUS_BELT Synchronous Belt
GEAR Gear
CHAIN Chain

Data Groups

RS0007

Name Description Data Type Units Constraints Req Notes
metadata Metadata data group {Metadata} schema=RS0007 \(✓\)
description Data group describing product and rating information {Description}
performance Data group containing performance information {Performance} \(✓\)

Description

Name Description Data Type Units Constraints Req Notes
product_information Data group describing product information {ProductInformation}

ProductInformation

Name Description Data Type Units Constraints Req Notes
manufacturer Manufacturer name String
model_number Model number Pattern Pattern shall match all model numbers that can be represented by the representation
drive_type Type of mechanical drive <DriveType>

Performance

Name Description Data Type Units Constraints Req Notes
speed_ratio Ratio of input shaft speed to output shaft speed Numeric - >0.0 \(✓\)
performance_map Data group describing drive performance when operating {PerformanceMap} \(✓\)

PerformanceMapMechDrive

Name Description Data Type Units Constraints Req Notes
grid_variables Data group describing grid variables for drive performance {GridVariablesMechDrive} \(✓\)
lookup_variables Data group describing lookup variables for drive performance {LookupVariables} \(✓\)

GridVariablesMechDrive

Name Description Data Type Units Constraints Req Notes
output_power Output shaft power [Numeric][1..] W ≥0.0 \(✓\)

LookupVariablesMechDrive

Name Description Data Type Units Constraints Req Notes
efficiency Efficiency of drive [Numeric/Null][1..] - ≥0.0, ≤1.0 \(✓\) Defined as the ratio of output shaft power to input shaft power
